extendedInfo.description: Movreak has been a *great* social app around movies and cinemas. It finally came to Android. Let's swipe the side menu, and you'll find these awesome features:â¢ Now PlayingIt presents the movies currently playing in cinema everywhere. Beside in thumbnails, Movreak can present the movie posters in âcoverâ mode. Movreak also lets you informed which movies are just released in cinema with the âNewâ badge. Touch a movie poster, youâll taste the new Show Time (for supported countries). Currently, show time is only available for Indonesia (for both 21 Cineplex and Blitzmegaplex). In this page, youâll find almost about everything you can do with show time: share show time to Facebook and Twitter, or organise a watching plan to watch movie together with friends. For supported cinema (only for Indonesiaâs Blitzmegaplex for now), you can check the seat availability in cinema.Touch âView Detailâ button and youâll find a whole lot more about the movie.â¢ Movie DetailsYouâll find everything-need-to-know about a movie here. Rating, genre, cast and crew, duration, release date, synopsis, you name it. Not satisfied? Just tap IMDB button to find a whole lot more about the movie. While youâre in this page, letâs taste the âliveâ poster. â¢ Search MovieYou can search any movies here, literally any movies you can think of, in cinemas or not. Want to search the first âTRONâ (1982)? Youâll find it, along with its details, posters, and even trailers.After search movie, what you can do next? Adding it to your Watching Plan.â¢ Watching Plan & Watched MoviesWatching movies is better together with friends. Playing in cinema or not, or even upcoming movie, you can invite your friends to watch it together.If you are a movie freak enough, you can use Watching Plan to organize all movies youâll watch in the weekend or spare time.Just watched a movie? Mark it as âwatchedâ and it will be automatically organized in your âWatched Moviesâ list. Hey, donât forget to review the movie you just watched in âUser Reviewâ.â¢ User ReviewsWe put a lot more ingredients in the new User Reviews. Just watch a movie and love it or hate it, why don't leave a review. Want to discuss a movie or not agree with someone's review? Just respond it. Keep the conversation going in the new User Reviews detail page.Like a review or want to report it as spoiler instead? tap â+â button and youâll find all you can do with a review.As you can search any movies in Movreak, now you can review any movies as well. Want to see reviews of currently playing movies only? Use the filter. Tapping User Reviewâs title will present you options to filter the reviews.â¢ Sign inTo experience all features, you should sign-in to Movreak with existing Facebook or Twitter account. **Hint: signing-in with Facebook will unlock more features.â¢ NotificationYour review get liked or replied, or youâre invited to watch a movie by your friend, youâll get notified with the push notification. --Currently, show time and cinema data are only available for Indonesia. But it doesnât mean you canât use Movreak outside that country. You can use all features beside show time and check seats.

reviews.title: Bad avatar!!!
reviews.comment: Aplikasi yg bagus, kontrol mudah, interface menarik, semuanya memudahkan user untuk mendapatkan info terupdate dari film yg saat ini beredar di bioskop. Hanya saja sayang sekali, avatar/logo aplikasi ini sangat tidak mencerminkan kualitas yg telah disebutkan di atas. Komposisi warna yg buruk serta paduan bentuk yg tidak mewakili aplikasi ini sendiri. Sayang sekali! Please, fix it!
reviews.author: Bobby Satriya

reviews.title: Lengkap
reviews.comment: Ini aplikasi kereeen! Wajib punya nih. Fitur-fiturnya lengkap. Informasi soal filmnya juga lengkap. Kereeeen!
reviews.author: Ahmad Fauzan

reviews.title: Bangga Indonesia
reviews.comment: Aplikasi yg UI nya keren, mudah dipake, dan informatif.

reviews.comment: diantar aplikasi serupa, ini Aplikasi paling lengkap! Dan Rajin banget update

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: Great UI, good features, but some information are not shown.

reviews.comment: Untuk yg kesulitan milih kota, tinggal klik tab bandung yg ada d bagian tengah atas, nti kluar pilihan kota lain.\tAplikasi yg seperti\'y selalu update waktu tayang, ngga seperti movplex, yg udah bikin gw ketinggalan man of steel.

reviews.comment: Some bugs were fixed, good UI, more feature. Really useful =)

reviews.title: App for movie freaks
reviews.comment: This app certainly lives it name. Browse schedules, post reviews, share to social medias, etc. One thing that is missing, I guess, is ticket purchasing :D

reviews.comment: The best app for the movie freak.
